com.qualcomm.hardware.ams

Interface AMSColorSensor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdafruitI2cColorSensor, AMSColorSensorImpl, LynxI2cColorRangeSensor

    public interface AMSColorSensor
    AMSColorSensor is an extension of ColorSensor that provides additional functionality supported by a family of color sensor chips from AMS.
    See Also:
    AMS Color Sensors, Adafruit color sensor

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description

      static class  AMSColorSensor.Parameters
      Instances of Parameters contain data indicating how the sensor is to be initialized.
      static class  AMSColorSensor.Pers 
      static class  AMSColorSensor.Register
      AMSColorSensor.Register provides symbolic names for interesting device registers
      static class  AMSColorSensor.Status 
      static class  AMSColorSensor.Wait
      Wait time is set 2.4 ms increments unless the WLONG bit is asserted, in which case the wait times are 12Ã— longer.
